title: Failed to Connect @ 78/79%
body:
The past day, when I have been trying to load into a game I get an error saying "Failed to connect, check internet connection". This occurs @ 78 or 79%. My internet is otherwise fine, no VPN, no downloads, etc. I have done the usual: restart of the game and my pc, full repair within the client. I out of ideas. Anything that can be offered would be a huge help. 

Thanks.

replies.body: Hmmmm you mentioned that you don't have a VPN setup, but I wonder if this could maybe be happening due to a firewall setting blocking those specific files. It may sound a little odd, but let's check those firewall settings really quickly. While you're there, let's be safe and run through the other steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to cover all your bases, but do focus on that firewall and let me know how it goes!
